entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Coral Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -31.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 06:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -31.1°C

Visibility: 11.3 km
Humidity: 72 %

Dewpoint: -34.5°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of light snow. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 31. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 35.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 35. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
